sense.name: officially preside over
sense.examples: As the group is moderated, the article is first checked by a moderator if appropriate. Please rate us, the forum mods and how we moderated the Germany boards. A professor in the Department of Economics moderated the discussion. He moderates the game, keeping in mind and reinforcing the limits and rules of the game.

sense.name: curb, restrain, lessen the intensity of
sense.examples: If you drink alcohol, whether beer, wine or spirits, moderate your consumption. The effect of free source licenses kicks in and moderates the fallout. Self-competence moderated the relationship between stress and emotional reaction. Employee worktime control moderates the effects of job strain and effort-reward imbalance on sickness absence.
